rateCode.hbm.xml

   <set name="ratecodeparams" lazy="false">
            <key>
                <column name="p_id" />
            </key>
            <one-to-many class="data.Ratecodeparam" />
        </set>

hibernate.cfg.xml   ->
 <mapping resource="data/Ratecodeparam.hbm.xml"/>
 <mapping resource="data/Ratecodes.hbm.xml"/>

this files are genereted through netbean Reverse Eng.

text:
sorry , coould not attach Attachement.

<hibernate-mapping package="data" >
    <class name="Ratecodeparam" table="ratecodeparam" >
        <id name="id" type="java.lang.Integer">
            <column name="id" />
            <generator class="identity" />
        </id>
        <many-to-one name="ratecodes" class="data.Ratecodes" fetch="select">
            <column name="p_id" />
        </many-to-one>

text: I don't see anything in this report that indicates a Tomcat bug. If you re-open this issue you are going to need to provide something for the Tomcat developers to work with.
